DOC.brief_summary: Intrahepatic cholestasis of pregnancy is a disease specific to pregnancy period; especially late second and third trimester. We aimed to investigate the role of apoptosis in etiopathogenesis of obstetric cholestasis.
DOC.brief_title: Apoptosis May Have a Role in Etiopathogenesis of Obstetric Cholestasis.
DOC.detailed_description: M30 (caspases cleaved Cytokeratin-18 (CK-18) fragment) is a specific apoptosis marker. We aimed to use it to evaluate the apoptotic process.
DOC.criteria: Late second or third trimester of pregnancy. Foreknown systemic diseases, multiple pregnancy, smoking cigarettes.
